title: Complete 44/44 N29 Allen & Ginter Non-Baseball Set for Sale
author: lampertb

posts.post_title: Complete 44/44 N29 Allen & Ginter Non-Baseball Set for Sale
posts.post_content:
Selling off my 44/44 complete non-baseball set of N29 Allen & Ginter 2nd series.  Check my previous posts to see that I collected these several years back.  I sold the 6 baseball cards on PWCC months ago.

There are several nice graded cards, but by and large it's a low-grade set.  There is some trimming on certain cards.  Plenty of back damage on some cards from scrapbooking, etc.

Net54 only allows me to post low-res photos, so if you email me, then I can send you plenty more higher-resolution photos for you to investigate on your own terms.

I am asking $1,250 shipped.  Email is best method of communication w/me.
